game.name: Police Car Stunt Driver
game.description:
Many people among of us want to be a cop. However, only a few get a chance to make their dream come true. But, there is no need to be disappointed if you could not become a police officer in a real life as the virtual world can allow you to take care of all the responsibilities of a cap in just a few clicks. Why do not you join Police Car Stunt Driver game to get that pleasure without putting your and others life into danger? It is completely free and available to play online without download.

Choose your police car and get ready to perform different death-defying stunts and make awe-inspiring jumps on the dangerous ramps across the city in this brand new racing game! The winner will be the one who can dare to set his own record through the whopping flips and jumps. Take your seat on your favourite car and come forward to make the jumps and flips from the highest ramps to make your own record!  In this HTML5 car game, you are a police interceptor so do not forget to turn on the cop siren, if needed.

Ride your vehicle like a maniac and feel free to drive it at a full sped to act as a professional police car stunt driver! Fire your engine and blow out the dirt off the car wheels on the off-road ramps to enjoy an immersive racing experience in this cool car driving simulator! Drive for long to earn more money to unlock new and advanced car models like a fabulous Lambo cop car in this crazy police stunt simulator! Eye catching 3D graphics and realistic car driving physics can keep you glued to the screen for long!
